subject: Medicine
title: The Ethics of Prescribing Placebos
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Ethics of Prescribing Placebos.

hook.text: Is it okay for a doctor to prescribe a pill they know is fake?

buildup.text: Many doctors admit to giving placebos without telling patients.

discovery.text: Surveys show up to half of doctors have done this at times.

twist.text: Patient trust could collapse if deception is discovered.

climax.text: Open-label placebos may offer an honest alternative path.

punchline.text: Honest placebos may solve the dilemma.

quiz.question: What ethical problem arises from prescribing hidden placebos?
